Skwyshii Vs. Duckbomb
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2008 Topics: (Year We Visited the Town): Skwyshii Vs. Duckbomb
By GM on Saturday, September 6, 2008 - 12:11 pm:

I recently purchased my dream PC (top-of-the-line HP Pavilion HDX) and decided to test it out by recording a few battles. To start, I pit two of my young MR4 monsters from my new save, Skwyshii (Metal Jell) and Duckbomb (Duck Fever) against one another.


Match 1

Match 2


Enjoy.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, September 6, 2008 - 04:53 pm:

By GM on Sunday, September 7, 2008 - 06:32 pm:

And here's the tiebreaker!

By fiffa46 on Sunday, September 7, 2008 - 06:39 pm:

Very good quality video's. How did you take them?

By GM on Sunday, September 7, 2008 - 07:12 pm:

I used an external USB device to plug the A/V cables of my PS3 into my computer (temporary, until I get the TV Tuner set up properly). I used Pinnacle Studio Plus to capture the battles in full DV quality and edit them. As such, the filesizes are a bit large, which makes uploading a major pain. I'm working on that.

As for the music, I set the in-game BGM to 0 in the options menu and substituted tracks from my own library (which includes the MR1, 2, 4 and Evo OSTs, ripped from the MFO music box player) while leaving the SFX at the default volume.
